name: CyberRunner (itch) (Michael Diaz)
description:
It's the year 2047, you, Not Postal Dude, have snuck into a facility and stole government secrets. Now you have to get out by any means necessary.

Controlls:
WASD - Movement
1 - Melee
2 - Gun

Features : Robocops, Level Editor, Banger Soundtrack, Headaches

(Warning: If the game gets detected as a virus, it's due to the engine [Clickteam Engine 2.5 + being bad at exporting])

Credits : 
Michael Diaz (Me) : Project Director And Coder

Sallo666 : Sprite Artist

ZukiZuk : The Music Maker God
